title: 047: Parasect
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Parasect is like a better Paras, but only for the mushroom…for the Parasect it still sucks…it gorges on trees until the forest is dead and then dies…its’ kids are then assaulted by the mushroom like that sloth picture. Circle of Life? Or the Followers of Magmar?  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), Chris

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Parasect_(Pokémon))
long_description:
Parasect is like a better Paras, but only for the mushroom…for the Parasect it still sucks…it gorges on trees until the forest is dead and then dies…its’ kids are then assaulted by the mushroom like that sloth picture. Circle of Life? Or the Followers of Magmar?
